name: ColorBall (Giovannigascot)
description:
A Multiplayer game made in less than 24 hours, Switch your character to the color of the ball to hit it in a best of 5 game .The most hardcore multiplayer game ever made ,hope you like it.

Player one
[a]Left
[d]Right
[s] To switch colors

Player Two
[Left arrow]Left
[Right arrow]Right
[Down arrow]To switch colors
